title: US Woman Rescued After 2 Litres Of Vape Fluid Extracted From Her Lungs
content: Jordan Brielle, a 32-year-old Ohio woman, suffered serious health issues after becoming addicted to vaping. Despite her deteriorating health, Brielle continued to vape, eventually leading to a medically induced coma.
summary: Jordan Brielle, a 32-year-old Ohio woman, suffered serious health issues after becoming addicted to vaping. Despite her deteriorating health, Brielle continued to vape, eventually leading to a medically induced coma.

title: Live Updates: Walkie-Talkie Explosions Kill 9, Injure Over 300 In Lebanon
content: Lebanon Blasts Live Updates: A series of walkie-talkie explosions caught Lebanon unawares today, killing at least nine people so far. According to Lebanon health ministry, over 300 people have been injured.
summary: Lebanon Blasts Live Updates: A series of walkie-talkie explosions caught Lebanon unawares today, killing at least nine people so far. According to Lebanon health ministry, over 300 people have been injured.

title: Pagers, Then Walkie Talkies: How Devices Were Weaponised Against Hezbollah
content: Twin attacks using communication devices, suspected to have an Israeli hand, have struck fear in the ranks of Hezbollah, the Iran-backed militant group based in Lebanon.
summary: Twin attacks using communication devices, suspected to have an Israeli hand, have struck fear in the ranks of Hezbollah, the Iran-backed militant group based in Lebanon.

title: Israel's Unit 8200 In Spotlight After Hezbollah Pager Attacks In Lebanon
content: The mass pager attack against Hezbollah in Lebanon has turned the spotlight on Israel's secretive Unit 8200, the Israel Defense Forces' intelligence unit, which a Western security source said was involved in planning the operation.
summary: The mass pager attack against Hezbollah in Lebanon has turned the spotlight on Israel's secretive Unit 8200, the Israel Defense Forces' intelligence unit, which a Western security source said was involved in planning the operation.

title: Won't Recognise Israel Without Palestinian State, Says Saudi Crown Prince
content: Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman on Wednesday said the kingdom would not recognise Israel without a Palestinian state and strongly condemned the "crimes of the Israeli occupation" against the Palestinian people.
summary: Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman on Wednesday said the kingdom would not recognise Israel without a Palestinian state and strongly condemned the "crimes of the Israeli occupation" against the Palestinian people.

title: 9 Killed In Lebanon Walkie-Talkie Blasts, What We Know So Far
content: While Lebanon was still reeling from the shock of yesterday's pager blasts that killed 12 people, the country has been shaken with a fresh series of nationwide walkie-talkie explosions, which have killed nine people so far and has injured hundreds.
summary: While Lebanon was still reeling from the shock of yesterday's pager blasts that killed 12 people, the country has been shaken with a fresh series of nationwide walkie-talkie explosions, which have killed nine people so far and has injured hundreds.

title: Elon Musk's Starlink Satellites 'Blocking' View Of The Universe: Report
content: Dutch scientists from ASTRON are raising concerns about the second-generation Starlink satellites, claiming they cause significant interference with radio telescopes.
summary: Dutch scientists from ASTRON are raising concerns about the second-generation Starlink satellites, claiming they cause significant interference with radio telescopes.

title: Video Shows Explosion At Funeral Of Hezbollah Member Killed In Pager Blast
content: A source close to Lebanon's Hezbollah said walkie talkies used by its members exploded in the group's Beirut stronghold, with a live stream on social media showing the chaos that unfolded during the explosion.
summary: A source close to Lebanon's Hezbollah said walkie talkies used by its members exploded in the group's Beirut stronghold, with a live stream on social media showing the chaos that unfolded during the explosion.

title: 9 Dead, 300 Injured As Walkie-Talkies Explode In Hezbollah Units In Lebanon
content: Nine people have died and more than 300 others wounded as walkie-talkies have blown up at Hezbollah strongholds across Lebanon. This comes a day after pagers exploded across the middle-eastern country, killing twelve people and injuring nearly 3,000
summary: Nine people have died and more than 300 others wounded as walkie-talkies have blown up at Hezbollah strongholds across Lebanon. This comes a day after pagers exploded across the middle-eastern country, killing twelve people and injuring nearly 3,000

title: China Man Told To Pay Rs 12 Lakh After His Dog Triggers Woman's Miscarriage
content: The dog suddenly bolted out of a building, causing Yan to step back and injure her back.

title: Hezbollah Says Launched 1st Attack On Israel Since Lebanon Pager Blasts
content: Iran-backed Hezbollah said on Wednesday it attacked Israeli artillery positions with rockets in the first strike at its arch-foe since pager blasts wounded thousands of its members in Lebanon and raised the prospect of a wider Middle East war.
summary: Iran-backed Hezbollah said on Wednesday it attacked Israeli artillery positions with rockets in the first strike at its arch-foe since pager blasts wounded thousands of its members in Lebanon and raised the prospect of a wider Middle East war.

title: Man Who Wanted To 'Kill' Trump Hid At Golf Course For 12 Hours, No One Knew
content: Two months after Donald Trump narrowly survived an assassination attempt, a gunman hid undetected for nearly 12 hours on the edge of the golf course where Trump played on Sunday under the protection of an agency that is being pushed to its limits.
summary: Two months after Donald Trump narrowly survived an assassination attempt, a gunman hid undetected for nearly 12 hours on the edge of the golf course where Trump played on Sunday under the protection of an agency that is being pushed to its limits.

title: 8-Year-Old US Girl Drives Mother's SUV To Store, Police Find Her Shopping
content: Police traced the vehicle to a Target parking lot in Bainbridge, where they found the child shopping inside.
summary: Police traced the vehicle to a Target parking lot in Bainbridge, where they found the child shopping inside.

title: Worst Drought On Record Lowers Amazon Rivers To All-Time Lows
content: The worst drought on record has lowered the water level of the rivers in the Amazon basin to historic lows, in some cases drying up riverbeds that were previously navigable waterways.
summary: The worst drought on record has lowered the water level of the rivers in the Amazon basin to historic lows, in some cases drying up riverbeds that were previously navigable waterways.

title: The Secret To Success? An NRI Billionaire Shares The One Essential Trait

title: Australian YouTuber Sparks Outrage After Calling Indian Spices "Dirt"
content: An Australian YouTuber has found herself in the middle of a social media storm after criticising Indian cuisine for its "dirt spices". Sydney Watson's remarks have drawn severe backlash, with users quickly jumping to defend Indian food.

title: Ukrainian Strike Triggers Earthquake-Sized Blast At Russian Arsenal: Report
content: A large-scale Ukrainian drone attack on Russia triggered an earthquake-sized blast at a major arsenal in the Tver region on Wednesday, forcing the evacuation of a nearby town, war bloggers and some media reported.
summary: A large-scale Ukrainian drone attack on Russia triggered an earthquake-sized blast at a major arsenal in the Tver region on Wednesday, forcing the evacuation of a nearby town, war bloggers and some media reported.
